A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So unbelievably disappointed!! I was fuming when I left the theater. Terrible story line! So many plot holes! So many unrealistic situations! Little to no character development! It's as if the writers had no clue as to how the previous movies went and what the Star Wars legacy is. Beautiful Vivid scenes... that's the only redeeming quality. Too Disneyfied for a movie that's supposed to have dark undertones and at least some semblance of seriousness.
